alert.note: Alert for Kauai East; Kauai Mountains; Kauai North; Kauai South (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 02 at 5:45PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Kauai in Kauai County through 615 PM HST... At 544 PM HST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Anahola, or 11 miles northeast of Lihue, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over sparsely populated areas of Kauai in Kauai County, including the following locations: Puhi...Kalihiwai... Hanamaulu...Kealia and Wailua River State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Kauai East; Kauai Mountains; Kauai North; Kauai South
